ys.succinct.util

Class RangeTreeParentheses

  • java.lang.Object
    • ys.succinct.util.RangeTreeParentheses
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BalancedParentheses

    public class RangeTreeParentheses
extends Object
implements BalancedParentheses
    BalancedParentheses implementation based on the range min-max tree (see K. Sadakane and G. Navarro. Fully-Functional Succinct Trees). The parentheses are represented as an integer array of bits where 1 bits correspond to the open parentheses and 0 bits correspond to the closed parentheses.
    Author:
    Yauheni Shahun

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RangeTreeParentheses(int[] vector, int size)
      Constructs the balanced parentheses' search structure.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int enclose(int index)
      Finds the position of the open parenthesis that most tightly encloses the given open parenthesis.
      int findClose(int openIndex)
      Finds the position of the closed parenthesis that matches the given open parenthesis.
      int findOpen(int closeIndex)
      Finds the position of the open parenthesis that matches the given closed parenthesis.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • RangeTreeParentheses

        public RangeTreeParentheses(int[] vector,
                    int size)
        Constructs the balanced parentheses' search structure. It's not verified that the underlying parentheses are balanced. In case of the unbalanced parentheses the result of the search operations is unpredictable.
        Parameters:
        vector - the array representation of the parentheses
        size - the number of the parentheses (bits)

        Description copied from interface: BalancedParentheses
        Finds the position of the closed parenthesis that matches the given open parenthesis.
        Specified by:
        findClose in interface BalancedParentheses
        Parameters:
        openIndex - the position (0-based) of the open parenthesis
        Returns:
        0-based index of the closed parenthesis

        Description copied from interface: BalancedParentheses

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • enclose

        public int enclose(int index)
        Description copied from interface: BalancedParentheses
        Finds the position of the open parenthesis that most tightly encloses the given open parenthesis.
        Specified by:
        enclose in interface BalancedParentheses
        Parameters:
        index - the position (0-based) of the open parenthesis
        Returns:
        0-based index of the enclosing open parenthesis, or -1 if such parenthesis doesn't exist
